name: Vanish
description:
In what could be described as a challenging test for your reflexes, Vanish is set out at sea where you need to accurately target and destroy dangerous balls coming at you at break neck speed! The aim of the game is to keep them from falling into your area and hitting the water by tapping each one, which releases a defensive orb.

If you make a hit, you destroy the threat, but if you miss you'll just have one more falling object to deal with when gravity brings your orb back towards you twice as fast.

So rather than just tapping away blindly, Vanish requires precision and timing. The movements and speeds of the falling balls can be unpredictable as you progress, adding something of a wrinkle into the game and throwing gamers off. The longer you keep your area protected, the higher your score!

Expect to addicted within minutes, and at times, slightly mad at yourself as you're sure to make mistakes in the early going!
